title: Truffle gnudi with broad beans, grilled Gem lettuce and pea purée
description: Gnudi are similar to gnocchi but made with ricotta cheese and semolina instead of potato. These light, pillowy dumplings are flavoured with truffle for an extravagant supper for two.  Equipment: For this recipe you will need a piping bag
ingredients: 125g/4½oz Parmesan (or alternative vegetarian hard cheese), grated
handful podded broad beans, outer skins removed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
